dataResources.description: Configuration block for data events. See details below.

excludeManagementEventSources.description: A set of event sources to exclude. Valid values include: `kms.amazonaws.com` and `rdsdata.amazonaws.com`. `include_management_events` must be set to`true` to allow this.

includeManagementEvents.description: Whether to include management events for your trail. Defaults to `true`.

readWriteType.description: Type of events to log. Valid values are `ReadOnly`, `WriteOnly`, `All`. Default value is `All`.
